name: One Bullet - Flip the gun
description:
Is one bullet enough to destroy your all enemies? yes of course. One Bullet is most challenging and fun game of 2018 that enables you to destroy your enemies by creating angles with just one bullet of your gun. Remember you have to shoot down your all enemies with one bullet only!
Beware of the obstacles.
Challenge your friends for the highest score. you can also share your results as well.
Game features:
- Free to play.
- One finger control.
- Different obstacles with different angles.
- Enjoy all 100 levels.
